bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes, extended head tube with reinforced collars, double tapered cromo stays, forged dropouts with eyelets

components.description: Carbon fiber unicrown with brake mounts, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with single eyelets
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 32H, Formula hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Alivio M410 SGS rear and M191 bottom pull front
Full alloy platform, toe clip attachable
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 25.4 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
NVO Components TM-4 adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 25.4 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (15"), 105mm (17-19"), 115mm (21-23"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco Elba with Syntex + Kevlar cover and carbon steel rails
Tektro alloy linear-pull brakes with front power modulator and Shimano brake levers
